name: The Innovators Crowd
tag_list: sharing-of-ideas, start-up-business, business-support, business-help, entrepreneurs, social-network
overview:
The Innovators Crowd Brings people together to share and discuss innovative ideas, to connect and collaborate to develop ideas and create the next generation of super startups.

The Innovators Crowd has teamed up with companies to offer a whole heap of exclusive discounted products and services to help people on their quest to starting a business, from website design, hosting, logos, printing services, office space to business plans and cash-flow templates you can find just about anything you need to kick start your business.

The Innovators Crowd Is packed with some of the most amazing features one of them being the Ideas Hub, the place where you share your ideas and have people vote on them in three categories Potential, Feasibilty and Innovation, people can also comment on ideas to give feedback. We know your thinking WOW that’s amazing but it doesn’t stop there you can also use the Groups feature to privately work on your ideas and develop them further or collaborate with other members by inviting them to the group.

The Innovators Crowd Will host monthly events where people can come along and demo their products or services, this will be a great chance to put faces to names and becuase we’re passionate about helping others we’ll be running workshops to help people brush up on general business skills.
